page.title: 18SOCIAL CONCERN BILLINGSHURST
page.content: "TOWNLANDS"IS A TWO STOREY BRICK BUILDING ERECTED IN 1962 AS SHELTERED ACCOMMODATION FOR THE ELDERLY.IT HAS 26 UNITS,MOSTLY SINGLE BUT SOME FOR MARRIED COUPLES.IT IS RUN BY THE HORSHAM DISTRICT COUNCIL AND HAS 1 FEMALE WARDEN WITH 1 RELIEF FOR OFF DUTY PERIODS.AN INTERCOM WAS INSTALLED IN 1985 TO REPLACE BELLS FOR EMERGENCIES.IT HAS A T.V. LOUNGE,2 LAUNDRY ROOMS,COMMUNAL TOILETS AND BATHROOMS AND A GUEST ROOM FOR VISITORS.THE OLDEST RESIDENT IS AGED 93.MEALS ON WHEELS AND HOME HELPS ARE AVAILABLE FOR THOSE WHO NEED THEM.
